backtesting.title: Quantitative Backtesting Platform
backtesting.description: Built a cloud-native platform supporting strategy design, backtesting, and data orchestration. Deployed on Sealos using Vue 3, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and AI-assisted development tools.

items.frontend: Frontend: Vue 3 + TypeScript + dark/light theme toggle
items.backend: Backend: Node.js + WebSocket + sandboxed strategy engine
items.optimizations: Optimizations: lazy loading, virtual scroll, sharded DB, caching
items.cicd: CI/CD with health monitoring and 99.95% uptime

backtesting.note: The project is currently under update and will be open source once the update is completed. Stay tuned!
